snippet: By the time the F.B.I. closed in on the suspects, the money had all been spent and the suspects believed they were all in the clear, according to law enforcement officials.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation announces the arrest of remaining suspects in a 2008 Manhattan robbery of an armored car, owned by Dunbar Armored, and long suspected to have been an inside job; one of those arrested, Janell Nelson, was the armored-car courier who was robbed.
lead_paragraph: By the time the F.B.I. closed in on the suspects, the money had all been spent and the suspects believed they were all in the clear, according to law enforcement officials.

headline.seo: Four New Arrests in 2008 Robbery of Armored-Car Guard Include the Guard
headline.main: Four Are Arrested in 2008 Robbery of an Armored-Car Guard, Including the Guard
headline.print_headline: Four Are Arrested in 2008 Robbery of an Armored-Car Guard, Including the Guard
